places.name: Sahara Desert
places.fact: The biggest hot desert in the world with sand dunes as tall as buildings!

places.name: Victoria Falls
places.fact: One of the biggest waterfalls - called 'The Smoke that Thunders'!

places.name: Cairo
places.fact: Has ancient pyramids nearby and sits on the famous Nile River!

places.name: Mount Kilimanjaro
places.fact: Tallest mountain in Africa with snow on top even near the equator!

places.name: Serengeti
places.fact: Home to big animal migrations with lions, zebras and wildebeest!

places.name: Great Wall of China
places.fact: Super long wall over 13,000 miles - built to keep out invaders!

places.name: Taj Mahal
places.fact: Beautiful white marble building in India built for love!

places.name: Mount Everest
places.fact: The tallest mountain in the whole world at 29,032 feet!

places.name: Tokyo
places.fact: Has lots of lights, robots and is one of the biggest cities!

places.name: Ganges River
places.fact: A holy river in India where millions of people bathe!

places.name: Eiffel Tower
places.fact: Lights up at night in Paris, France - 1,063 feet tall!

places.name: Big Ben
places.fact: Huge clock tower in London that chimes every hour!

places.name: Colosseum
places.fact: Ancient arena in Rome where gladiators fought - held 50,000 people!

places.name: London
places.fact: Has red double-decker buses and the King's palace!

places.name: Alps
places.fact: Snowy mountains for skiing across several countries!

places.name: Statue of Liberty
places.fact: Holds a torch in New York Harbor - a gift from France!

places.name: Grand Canyon
places.fact: Huge canyon carved by a river with rocks 1.8 billion years old!

places.name: New York City
places.fact: Has tall skyscrapers, Times Square and Central Park!

places.name: Niagara Falls
places.fact: Three waterfalls on the US-Canada border!

places.name: Yellowstone
places.fact: Has geysers like Old Faithful - first national park ever!

places.name: Amazon Rainforest
places.fact: Biggest rainforest with more animals than anywhere else!

places.name: Machu Picchu
places.fact: Ancient Inca city on a mountain top in Peru!

places.name: Rio de Janeiro
places.fact: Has Christ the Redeemer statue and famous beaches!

places.name: Galapagos Islands
places.fact: Has unique animals like giant tortoises that inspired Darwin!

places.name: Iguazu Falls
places.fact: Has 275 waterfalls - bigger than Niagara!

places.name: Great Barrier Reef
places.fact: Huge coral reef home to 1,500 fish species - seen from space!

places.name: Sydney Opera House
places.fact: Looks like white sails in Sydney, Australia!

places.name: Uluru
places.fact: A big red rock sacred to Aboriginal people that changes color!

places.name: Sydney
places.fact: Has famous harbor bridge and koalas nearby!

places.name: Fiordland
places.fact: Deep fjords in New Zealand with penguins and seals!

places.name: South Pole
places.fact: The coldest place on Earth - no one lives there permanently!

places.name: Ross Ice Shelf
places.fact: Huge floating ice the size of France with penguins!

places.name: McMurdo Station
places.fact: Biggest research base in Antarctica with up to 1,000 scientists!

places.name: Mount Erebus
places.fact: Active volcano with a lava lake in freezing cold Antarctica!

places.name: Antarctic Peninsula
places.fact: Warmer part with whales, seals and lots of wildlife!
